contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Italictitle}}{{Taxobox | name = Leiosaurus | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[reptile|Sauropsida]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Leiosauridae]] | genus = '''''Leiosaurus''''' | genus_authority = [[André Marie Constant Duméril|Duméril]] and [[Bibron]], 1837 }} '''''Leiosaurus''''' is a genus of lizards. It cantains the following species: *''[[Leiosaurus bellii]] <small>[[André Marie Constant Duméril|Duméril]] and [[Bibron]], 1837</small> *''[[Leiosaurus catamarcensis]] <small>[[Koslowsky]], 1898</small> *''[[Leiosaurus jaguaris]] <small>[[Laspiur]], [[Acosta (genus authority)|Acosta]], and [[Abdala]], 2007</small> *''[[Leiosaurus paronae]] <small>[[Peracca]], 1897</small> [[Category:Leiosaurids]]
